## Mixer Details

- **Brand:** (e.g., Yamaha)
- **Model:** (e.g., DM7)
- **Common in churches?** Yes / No

## Technical Specifications

- **Gain Range:** (e.g., -6 to 66 dB)
- **Number of PEQ Bands:** (e.g., 4)
- **Fader Range:** (e.g., -inf to +10 dB)
- **Unity Position:** (e.g., 0 dB)
- **Has HPF per channel?** Yes / No
- **Has built-in compressor?** Yes / No

Links to the mixer's technical specifications, user manual, or MIDI protocol documentation.

Any notes about how this mixer differs from the ones already supported.
